name: quill-illustration
description: This module is a modification of the quill-comment module described as "Comment plugin for Quill Editor. This plug-in is used to mark which part of a document is commented by who at what time in quill delta. It is made UX-independant by exposing callbacks to hook in". This specific implementation allows you to add an illustration which is essentially a comment with an image attached to it.
author: Axone Network
